section.heading: Electronic Signature.
section.text: For each electronically filed disclosure statement, the filer shall include an electronic signature on the statement of contribution.

section.heading: Acceptance of Electronic Signature.
section.text: A filer shall use any State Board approved password generated by the person doing public business after the person or business entity has registered with the State Board.

annotations.annotation: Commercial Law Article, §21-117(a); Election Law Article, §§2-102(b)(4) and 14-109; Annotated Code of Maryland
